titleStmt.title: Some necessary & seasonable cases of conscience about things indifferent in matters of religion, briefly, yet faithfully stated [a]nd resolved wherein the the [sic] just bounds of imposing on one hand, and of obeying on the other, are truly fixed, / by an indifferent hand.
titleStmt.author: Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold at the sign of the George in Fleet-street, and the fi[r]st shop in Westminster-Hall,
